question:
Which of the following were the successor of Burhan ul Mulk?
1) Safdar Jung
2) Asaf ud Daulah
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Before the death of Saadat Khan Burhan ul Mulk, he made his position as hereditary. Safdar Jung and Asaf ud Daulah were the successors of Saadat Khan Burhan ul Mulk.Â  They gave long-term administrative stability to the Awadh province.
